title: 07/05/21 DPS Hour 1 Henry Abbott
itunes:title: 07/05/21 DPS Hour 1 Henry Abbott
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins, in for Dan, discuss this year's NBA Finals and look at whether or not this year's champion will need an asterisk. The guys dive into Sha'Carri Richardson's suspension and explain why it's proceeding the way it needs to. Henry Abbott of True Hoop joins the guys to discuss Chris Paul's path to his first Finals and how his perception is transforming. Plus, can Shohei Ohtani lift up all of Major League Baseball through his success?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
